chunks.text:
Gain instant confidence in your data with ClickUp's intuitive Dashboards. Quickly set up visual representations of your key metrics using pre-built templates or customizable options, perfect for team tracking and informed decision-making.
Open my Dashboard <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/JIZQC8BRLCJV56GIzCltyXk_r?domain=links.clickup.com> 	 
 
Start fast with Dashboard templates

Choose from a variety of pre-configured Dashboard setups, like Task Tracking or Sprint Planning. These templates come with pre-set cards that you can customize to visualize data specific to your needs. It's the quickest way to accurately analyze your work.
 
 <https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/public/users/Integrators/669d5713-9b6a-46bb-bd7e-c542cff6dd6a/c24ba18b0d184a68becd65689a02ad77/Add%20a%20Dashboard%20view%20800.gif> 	
 
Access Dashboards where you work

Choose from a variety of pre-configured Dashboard setups, like Task Tracking or Sprint Planning. These templates come with pre-set cards that you can customize to visualize data specific to your needs. It's the quickest way to accurately analyze your work.
 
 <https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/public/users/Integrators/669d5713-9b6a-46bb-bd7e-c542cff6dd6a/c24ba18b0d184a68becd65689a02ad77/Add%20a%20Dashboard%20view%20800.gif> 	
 
Access Dashboards where you work

Add Dashboards directly to Spaces, Folders, or Lists in ClickUp. This allows you to concentrate on specific team or project data right where tasks are managed. By consolidating relevant information, these location-based Dashboards provide simplified visibility for easier analysis.
 
 <https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/public/users/Integrators/669d5713-9b6a-46bb-bd7e-c542cff6dd6a/c24ba18b0d184a68becd65689a02ad77/Dashboard%20at%20Location%20-%20800.gif>
